justification: “The Child Behavior Checklist (CBCL) is a widely used tool for assessing emotional and behavioral problems in children.”
“Traditionally, interrater reliability, also known as interrater agreement, has been tackled using metrics like the kappa coefficient (Cohen,1960).”
“Traditionally, interrater reliability… has been tackled using metrics like the kappa coefficient … and Bland-Altman (Bland & Altman, 1986).”

“We call the outcome enclosed by the two curves…the Random Effect Area (REA). For each informant pair, we calculated the REA index to sort the paired informants by their true agreement variability.”
